where r.room_location like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and r.room_num not in ( select v.room_num from tbl_reservation v where (room_reserv_start_date > #{room_reserv_start_date} and room_reserv_end_date <= #{room_reserv_end_date}) or (room_reserv_start_date > #{room_reserv_start_date} and room_reserv_start_date <= #{room_reserv_end_date}) or (room_reserv_end_date > #{room_reserv_start_date} and room_reserv_end_date <= #{room_reserv_end_date}) )
and r.room_people >= #{room_people} and (r.room_price >= #{low_price} and r.room_price <= #{high_price})
and regexp_like(r.room_type_num, #{joinType})
and r.room_bathroom >=#{room_bathroom} and r.room_bed >=#{room_bed}
r.room_option_code LIKE '%'|| #{option} ||'%'
and room_status = 'Y'
